actions.text: Amendment SA 3733 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 3733 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Hirono to Amendment SA 3695. (consideration: CR S5901; text: CR S5901) To authorize the use of amounts to reimburse the Government of the Republic of Palau for land acquisition costs for defense sites.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3733 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3733 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Hirono to Amendment SA 3695.

amends_amendment.purpose: In the nature of a substitute.

purpose: To authorize the use of amounts to reimburse the Government of the Republic of Palau for land acquisition costs for defense sites.
